definition: Modi (name)/Narendra Modi (1950-), Indian BJP (Bharatiya Janata Party or Indian People's Party) politician, Gujarat Chief Minister from 2001, PM from 2014

sentences.english: The pirate Modi did not like shots.
The same was the result of PMs Japan Visit and Obama's India Visit.
sentences.chinese: 莫迪訪日和奧巴馬訪印度的結果也是如此。

sentences.english: The Prime Minister is on a three-day state visit to the US.
sentences.chinese: 目前，莫迪總理正在對美國進行爲期三天的國事訪問。

sentences.english: Where is all of Mr. Modi's aggressiveness he showed during election time, against China?
sentences.chinese: 大選期間，莫迪對中國表現出的攻擊性去哪了？

sentences.english: I hope I could be in his advisory panel.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我能進入莫迪的顧問組。

sentences.english: Smd Chawla () 1 day agoModi speech in China was unbelievable and unthinkable.
sentences.chinese: 莫迪在中國的演講是難以置信的，是不可思議的。

sentences.english: Due to Modi we lost one of our true friend Russia.
sentences.chinese: 莫迪讓我們失去了俄羅斯這個真正的朋友。

sentences.english: The immediate onus is on Modi.
sentences.chinese: 現在需要擔負起責任的是莫迪。

sentences.english: Mr. Modi should not get trapped in UPA/Congress American trap.
sentences.chinese: 莫迪先生不應該被困在美國國會的陷阱裏。

sentences.english: Then, seemingly on the spur of the moment, Morty started a squabble.
sentences.chinese: 後來，似乎一時衝動，莫迪和我發生口角。

sentences.english: Modis strong push from Red fort will only catalyse the possibility to reality.
sentences.chinese: 莫迪在紅堡發表的演說將促成其成爲現實。

sentences.english: Mr. Modi says he did nothing wrong.
sentences.chinese: 莫迪先生說他沒有做錯任何事情。

sentences.english: Some people have a habit of blaming it on Modi for anything and everything these days.
sentences.chinese: 某些人養成了一切都怪莫迪的習慣。

sentences.english: Modi message is live in peace and prosper.
sentences.chinese: 莫迪的信息存在於和平與繁榮中。

sentences.english: Hey Modi, You have given a begging bowl in the hands of your Bharath Mata and abandoned her in front of Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 嘿，莫迪，你拿着乞討飯碗，在耶穌面前丟棄尊嚴。

sentences.english: He put fresh hay around Maudie and went to look for some old cloth.
sentences.chinese: 他把乾草放在莫迪周圍，然後去尋找一些舊布料。

definition: Erdogan (name)/Recep Tayyip Erdoğan (1954-), Turkish politician, prime minister from 2003
Robert Mugabe (1924-), Zimbabwean ZANU-PF politician, president of Zimbabwe 1987-2017
Aung San Suu Kyi (1945-), Myanmar opposition leader and 1991 Nobel Peace laureate/also written 昂山素姬
Donald Trump (1946-), American business magnate, US president 2017-
Netanyahu (name)/Benjamin Netanyahu (1949-), Israeli Likud politician, prime minister 1996-1999 and from 2009
Muhammad Naguib (1901-1984), first president of the Republic of Egypt
Jawaharlal Nehru (1889-1964), Indian politician, first prime minister 1947-1964
Mahmoud Ahmadinejad (1956-), Iranian fundamentalist politician, president of Iran 2005-2013/abbr. for 艾哈邁迪內賈德|艾哈迈迪内贾德
